Text:

Works fine for DVD's and is clean.

I got This message from anydvd when i put blu-ray disc in, This version of AnyDVD does not work with Blu-ray discs!
Please upgrade your keycode to AnyDVD HD!

Want make all clear, the program works well but key is not HD key its only ordinary standard key, thanks ChattChitto, its first time I got wrong key from you, hope you come with  another working HD key, thanks :)

OK. First of all, thanks ChattChitto for always being there with the latest version! Thanks for being reliable, trustworthy, and thanks for the awesome music that plays with your installer. :-) 
I just wanted to let you know that this most recent version is set to automatically check for updates. I think historically you have disabled this so I didn't even have to go back in and uncheck the box in the settings. I didn't know if this was something that changed or something you overlooked while you were busy. I certainly am not complaining. I just thought you might want to know. Thanks again for all your stuff!

Can you do the latest 7.0.2.0 please
cheers
